Articles.Content:
Hello all.

I took a stab at building an ASAS module and an RCS fuel tank to fit onto the larger 2 meter parts. I thought I\'d put them here and let people try them out to see if there are any bugs before releasing them on the official mod release section. They are extremely simple but they appear to work, at least so far as I can tell.

Here\'s a look:

http://www./view/?vf9j7cg6rv83x2f

Not sure if I did that right...

And here is the file:

http://www./download.php?ia6masu6rb1vdmr

Also, if anyone can help me with how to incorporate the normal map in the Unity part tools, it would be much appreciated. Not to mention the parts would probably look a lot better as well.

EDIT: Urethra! I figured out the bump maps. I still think the parts could look better though. Any advice on optimizing materials, objects, etc would be most welcome.

-Menecroth
As far as I\'m concerned, there is already a mod including all stock parts with tweaked ratios.

As far as I\'m concerned, there is already a mod including all stock parts with tweaked ratios.

Oh, I know that. There are several different versions of a lot of parts for the game as well. I just wanted to build another set of those parts. I may add more stuff on later but I wanted to see how these worked first.

'Urethra!'

...

...

Spell check fail?

I got that from a cartoon. A character discovers something and exclaims 'urethra!' instead of 'eureka.'

At any rate, if anyone had downloaded a previous version of this and couldn\'t attach parts to the surface, please re-download as I have fixed that problem.

Also, I don\'t think I\'m going to continue to develop these parts \'cause:

A) They look freaking hideous. The light doesn\'t hit them properly for some reason.

There just doesn\'t seem to be that much interest.

And I guess C) someone did, in fact, rescale the stock parts anyway.

-Menecroth
